untitled.title: Untitled Reverse Engineering Project
untitled.summary: An attempt to disassemble, understand, reimplement, and document an early 1990s DOS game using the original C compiler and x86 assembler from 1988.

salt.title: Salt
salt.summary: The configuration management code that launched this web server and everything on it.

windowbox.title: Windowbox
windowbox.summary: Windowbox is a photo-hosting website where I post pictures directly from my phone. They used to call it "moblogging" back in the day; now everybody does it all the time.

leroux-cache.title: leroux-cache
leroux-cache.summary: A cache object that actually deletes the least-recently-used items.

internetstapler.title: Internet Stapler
internetstapler.summary: It is a stapler for our internet age.

isthatcompanyreal.title: Is That Company Real?
isthatcompanyreal.summary: A web service that determines whether or not a given company is “real.”

docroute.title: Docroute
docroute.summary: A dynamic CMS for mostly-static content. This entire site is powered by Docroute.

sort-of-face.title: The Sort of Face
sort-of-face.summary: Inspired by the popular (and eventually debunked) Twitter account @horse_ebooks, The Sort of Face is my attempt at creating a Twitter bot that generates funny gibberish.

twanslationparty.title: twanslationparty
twanslationparty.summary: Working in conjunction with twitstash, twanslationparty corrupts the English text in one Twitter account's timeline and posts the result to another account.

twitstash.title: twitstash
twitstash.summary: twitstash is a cron script that archives a Twitter user’s timeline into a MySQL database for search, data mining, or as a foundation for twanslationparty bots.

trigger-and-freewheel.title: Trigger and Freewheel CMS
trigger-and-freewheel.summary: The Trigger and Freewheel CMS powers a webcomic of the same name that I started drawing in 2008 and have been sporadically updating since.
